description: Number of irreducible positions of size n in Montreal solitaire.
references: Cannings, C.; Haigh, J.; Montreal solitaire. J. Combin. Theory Ser. A 60 (1992), no. 1, 50-66.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, _Mira Bernstein_
